body_html:
@petewarden I installed tf from the official pip wheel on a RPi 3.
It actually works much faster than in my previous tests: I achieved about 8 fps using a retrained mobilenet model (0.25, 128, quantified) from python apis, which is very good.
I noticed that the first couple of runs of the model are quite slow (about 10 times slower) but after that, tf optimizes the run and achieves very good performance, using all of the available resources (4 cores on the RPi).
